title: Procesadora La Hacienda, Inc., Recalls Beef Products due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: Details of this recall were updated Dec. 19, 2018 to reflect increased poundage produced. WASHINGTON, Oct. 31, 2018 Procesadora La Hacienda, Inc., a San Lorenzo, P.R. establishment, is recalling approximately 10,200 pounds of ready-to-eat (RTE) corned beef products that may be contaminated with...
